put.description: Creates or updates a DNS resolver.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the CreateOrUpdate operation.

201.description: The DNS resolver has been created.

200.description: The DNS resolver has been updated.

202.description: The operation to upsert DNS resolver has been accepted and will complete asynchronously.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the Update operation.

200.description: The DNS resolver has been updated.

202.description: The operation to update DNS resolver has been accepted and will complete asynchronously.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

delete.description: Deletes a DNS resolver. WARNING: This operation cannot be undone.

200.description: The DNS resolver has been deleted.

202.description: The operation to delete DNS resolver has been accepted and will complete asynchronously.

204.description: The DNS resolver was not found.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

DnsResolverProperties.description: Represents the properties of a DNS resolver.

virtualNetwork.description: The reference to the virtual network. This cannot be changed after creation.

dnsResolverState.description: The current status of the DNS resolver. This is a read-only property and any attempt to set this value will be ignored.

provisioningState.description: The current provisioning state of the DNS resolver. This is a read-only property and any attempt to set this value will be ignored.

resourceGuid.description: The resourceGuid property of the DNS resolver resource.

systemData.description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

nextLink.description: The continuation token for the next page of results.

DnsResolverNameParameter.name: dnsResolverName
DnsResolverNameParameter.description: The name of the DNS resolver.

InboundEndpointNameParameter.name: inboundEndpointName

VirtualNetworkNameParameter.name: virtualNetworkName

DnsForwardingRulesetNameParameter.description: The name of the DNS forwarding ruleset.

TopParameter.name: $top
TopParameter.description: The maximum number of results to return. If not specified, returns up to 100 results.

IfMatchParameter.name: If-Match
IfMatchParameter.description: ETag of the resource. Omit this value to always overwrite the current resource. Specify the last-seen ETag value to prevent accidentally overwriting any concurrent changes.

IfNoneMatchParameter.name: If-None-Match
IfNoneMatchParameter.description: Set to '*' to allow a new resource to be created, but to prevent updating an existing resource. Other values will be ignored.
